room_title: Escape room "Architect's Studio" by Puzzle Out Room in New York
review: We had an amazing time tonight. We chose the Architect's studio. The staff was very friendly and welcoming, especially Carol! She took her time explaining the story and gave excellent hints. The room was very clean, there was a place to hang coats, and there were bottles of hand sanitizer around for us germophobes lol. The game was super challenging and even though we failed the mission (pretty badly lol) we had a great time full of laughter, confusion, and cheers. Can't wait to do it again! Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Architect's Studio" by Puzzle Out Room in New York
review: We did this as a gift for one of friends. Six of us tried the Architect's Studio. Quite difficult. We didn't win but we all had a blast, laughs and confusion.Great location - come 15 minutes early to find free parking. Don't be late!The other groups that came all commented on coming again to try another escape room.I challenge you to win this escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Architect's Studio" by Puzzle Out Room in New York
review: This is a great activity to do with friends. I played both at the Hoboken and Jersey City locations and had a blast. I would highly recommend coming here!

room_title: Escape room "Architect's Studio" by Puzzle Out Room in New York
review: This place is amazing! We were a group of four and it was our first time ever doing a puzzle/escape room and we still haven't stopped talking about it! We made it out with 53 seconds remaining!!! The puzzles are so clever. The owner is so friendly and very welcoming! Highly recommend doing this experience!

room_title: Escape room "Architect's Studio" by Puzzle Out Room in New York
review: This is by far the best escape room in the area! Checked out both locations, in Hoboken and Jersey City, and had a great time at each place. You can't go wrong going to either location. Great alternative to the typical night out. Skip the movies and go here!
